name: Project: Gemini
description:
Jump, Dash, Shoot and Smash your way through a Neon City that has been taken over by swarms of Corrupted Drone Police force.

Project: Gemini is a Co-op game that sees Guttierez (Gutz) and Cricket work closely together to escape the city. Gutz acts as the foundation of the duo, providing stability and safety and is equipped with an automatically recharging shield to block attacks. Cricket is the tactical operative, supplying versatility and opportunity with her ranged weaponry and stun-kick. They can only survive by working in tandem and combining their unique set of skills.

Navigate your way through the futuristic city and destroy any evil drones that stand in your path. They've set up auto turrets, barbed wire and even road blocks at certain checkpoints in an attempt to prevent your escape from their tyrannical rule. Find and hit levers to open doors, then fight your way out of an arena of drones sent to capture you.

This student game was made in less than One year. The dev team had a lot of fun working on it. We've poured so much time, energy and passion into making this game great. Our hope is to now share that with you and give you an enjoyable experience.
